sect2.title: System.SetLanguage
sect2.para: This operator changes the current language of the DAE. There are only two possible languages that can be specified, D4 and RealSQL. If another string is passed to the operator the DAE will give an error stating that the requested value was not found.

Clearly, this operator should be run on its own. Changing the language does not affect the script in which it is executed. The current language is a session level setting; it affects subsequent compilations.
